name: Fujin Run
description:
The god of wind was a god long enough!

Show him what you got, battle against your competitors and win the title of the god of wind!

Controls

Space/Enter/Left Mouse/Controller A: Roll die

Left Stick: Move (in minigames)

Space/Left Mouse/Controller A: Interact (in minigames)

Minigames

A God's Birthday - Blow out the most candles!

Fujin's Rage - Avoid all incoming obstacles!
